code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[keyword,setKeyword]=useState('');const[results,setResults]=useState(null);const handleInputChange=e=>{setKeyword(e.target.value);};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/analyze',{keyword});setResults(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Sentiment Analysis"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:keyword,onChange:handleInputChange,placeholder:"Enter a keyword"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Analyze"})]}),results&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Results"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Twitter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:results.tweet_df}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Reddit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:results.reddit_df}})]})]});}export default App;
